channel.title: Compiling problem
channel.description:
http://img98.imageshack.us/img98/6474/help8qj.jpg
k, look at the image to see my problem anyways it says like this:
javac is not recognized as an internal or external command operable program or batch file.
what do i need to do to get it compiling.[br][size=1]Posted at: July 13, 2006, 07:25:10 AM[/size][hr]oh, and im using testscape source.

item.title: Compiling problem
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[code]
@echo off
COLOR F0
Title cOmPiLeR
echo *******************************************************************************
echo * Compile Complete by Jakkie123 *
echo * *
echo * specially created for NOOBS!!! *
echo * *
echo *******************************************************************************
echo Checking Java version…
echo.

:checkjava
echo 06
if exist “C:/program files/java/jdk1.5.0_06/bin/javac.exe” goto java6
echo 07
if exist “C:/program files/java/jdk1.5.0_07/bin/javac.exe” goto java7
echo 08
if exist “C:/program files/java/jdk1.5.0_08/bin/javac.exe” goto java8
echo 09
if exist “C:/program files/java/jdk1.5.0_09/bin/javac.exe” goto java9
echo 10
if exist “C:/program files/java/jdk1.5.0_10/bin/javac.exe” goto java10

:java6
echo.
echo compiling…
echo java version: 1.5.0_06
echo.
“C:/program files/java/jdk1.5.0_06/bin/javac.exe” *.java -nowarn *.java
goto end

:java7
echo.
echo compiling…
echo java version: 1.5.0_07
echo.
“C:/program files/java/jdk1.5.0_07/bin/javac.exe” *.java -nowarn *.java
goto end

:java8
echo.
echo compiling…
echo java version: 1.5.0_08
echo.
“C:/program files/java/jdk1.5.0_08/bin/javac.exe” *.java -nowarn *.java
goto end

:java9
echo.
echo compiling…
echo java version: 1.5.0_09
echo.
“C:/program files/java/jdk1.5.0_09/bin/javac.exe” *.java -nowarn *.java
goto end

:java10
echo.
echo compiling…
echo java version: 1.5.0_10
echo.
“C:/program files/java/jdk1.5.0_10/bin/javac.exe” *.java -nowarn *.java
goto end

:end
echo.
echo Complete!
echo.
set recomp=
set /p recomp= press enter to close
goto close

:close
echo.
echo closing compiler…[/code]

PUT THAT INTO YOUR COMPILER!!

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling problem
item.dc:creator: @mod_joery joery
item.description:
@mod_joery wrote:

yeah i had the same problem…

im gonna copy a text from another topic on this forum so u know what to do.

t will only work now if you have the latest version of JDK installed you can get them here:https://sdlc1a.sun.com/ECom/EComActionServlet;jsessionid=5ABA8F1380E884951126B46F02153F22, and i will show you how to edit your class path (Or create it rather)
(WINDOWS USERS ONLY)
Click Start Go up to My computer RIGHT click, and select properties.
Now Click the Tab: Advanced.
When you are in the proper spot you should see this window:

http://realmofrunescape.com/SystemProperties.gif

Now, Click the Button: Environment Variables And click the top “New” button,
Now Type
Code:

Classpath

where it says Variable Name, and type SET
Code:

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin;%CLASSPATH%;.

Where it says Variable Value,
Now Click Ok.
Click the Same New button again
Now for variable name we are putting
Code:

path

And for Variable value we are putting
Code:

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin;C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_06\bin

[NOTE: In order for this to work you must have installed the latest version of JDK]
Now you must have a client to run on your server you can get MoparScape from the following link: http://ihud.com/file.php?file=220306/1143050730/MoparScapePriv21.zip.
Now your all done.
Thanks and i hope this tutorial is helpful.

IF YOUR BEHIND A ROUTER:
You will need to setup port forwarding for port 43594 This can be rather difficult and since ALL routers are different then you will need to consult your router manual
Presto Your server is working… if you have ANY problem while using this tutorial
IF YOUR RUNNING WINDOWS FIREWALL:
Open Windows SECURITY panel and find Exceptions
now click Add Port
name the port RuneScape Server
put 43594 in the port field
post if you are having any problems with finding it.

Credits of this guide go to Darkest_mage.

btw if it stil dustn work pm me and i’l help u then

Read full topic
